ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Dick Dillin,Gene Colan,Henry Boltinoff,Mort Meskin,Mort Meskin,Henry Boltinoff,Gene Colan,Alex Toth
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Nest of Fear!: Mark and Elsa discover a cave that contains three legendary giant creatures - a roc, a kraken and a man-monster, all created by an ancient alien intelligence sent to Earth to determine a suitable life form to rule the planet. As the monsters attack them Mark and Elsa are helped by the alien's final creation - an advanced form of humankind.
Secret Locked in the Ice: A thief returns to the Alps to recover stolen money previously lost there but the search ends in his capture.
Eclipso's Amazing Ally!: Eclipso builds a robot Eclipso to fool Bruce Gordon but when the robot Eclipso traps Bruce and Professor Bennett and tries to kill them, Eclipso must help them escape.
ComicInfo.Tags: Professor Bennett,Memakata,Moolah the Mystic,Eclipso,Mark Merlin,Elsa,Bruce Gordon,The Alps,Peter Puptent,Mona Bennett
